intro: Tibouchina aspera, commonly known as roughleaf tibouchina, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Melastomataceae and is characterized by its attractive, showy flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub with rough, sometimes hairy leaves.
